alerts.search_string: price > 3000 and price < 5000 and material.str.contains('Carbon') and location.str.contains('Canada') and (restrictions.str.contains('within') or restrictions.str.contains('globally')) and frame_size.str.contains('M') and (front_travel.str.contains('140') or front_travel.str.contains('130')) and (ad_title.str.contains('2019') or ad_title.str.contains('2020') or ad_title.str.contains('2021'))
price < 4000 and frame_size == 'L' and location.str.contains('Canada') and (front_travel.str.contains('150') or front_travel.str.contains('160') or front_travel.str.contains('170'))
